parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries returned per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPC to which the route table belongs.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the route table to be queried belongs.

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the route table that you want to query.

parameters.name: RouteTableName
parameters.description: The name of the route table that you want to query.

parameters.name: RouteTableType
parameters.description:
The type of the route table. Valid values:
- **System**
- **Custom**

parameters.name: RouterId
parameters.description: The ID of the router to which the route table belongs.

parameters.name: RouterType
parameters.description:
The type of the router to which the route table belongs. Valid values:

*   **VRouter** (default)
*   **VBR**

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the route table belongs.

After this parameter is specified, the value of the **RouterType** parameter is automatically set to **VRouter**.
